name: test_e2e_with_logs[048_SQLI_BOOL_012]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BOOL_012` |
| **Name** | EXISTS subquery injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | boolean_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' OR EXISTS(SELECT 1) --`
- **Encoded**: `'%20OR%20EXISTS(SELECT%201)%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~60000ms
- **Timestamp**: 10:06:24.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BOOL_012-1772100384265-e3g8kr pattern_id=SQLI_BOOL_012 uri=/?q='%20OR%20EXISTS(SELECT%201)%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
